Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at GIT Ciudad de Zaragoza in Zaragoza, you'll be in the business district and convenient to Goya Park and Basilica de Nuestra Senora del Pilar. This hotel is within close proximity of Torreon de la Zuda and Roman Wall.

Rooms
Stay in one of 114 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with shower/tub combinations are provided. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of GIT Ciudad de Zaragoza.

Business, Other Amenities
Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at a coffee shop/café serving guests of GIT Ciudad de Zaragoza.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Stay in one of 114 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with shower/tub combinations are provided. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

With a stay at GIT Ciudad de Zaragoza in Zaragoza, you'll be in the business district and convenient to Goya Park and Basilica de Nuestra Senora del Pilar. This hotel is within close proximity of Torreon de la Zuda and Roman Wall.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Goya Park - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Torreon de la Zuda - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Basilica de Nuestra Senora del Pilar - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Roman Wall - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Plaza del Pilar - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Luis Bunuel Water Park - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Goya Monument - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Museo del Puerto Fluvial de Caesaraugusta - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
La Seo Cathedral - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Museo del Foro de Caesaraugusta - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Museo Ibercaja Camon Aznar - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Pablo Gargallo Museum - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Santa Maria Magdalena Church - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Roman Theatre - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Plaza de Espana - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi

The preferred airport for GIT Ciudad de Zaragoza is Zaragoza (ZAZ) - 11.7 km / 7.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
